title: Never Forever
description: CallieMy heart belongs to one man but my loyalty is to my family.I owe my brother my life and I swore on his grave vengeance.Finally it is in my grasp but to get it I must walk away from my heartand what I have left of my innocence.My decision, but will I be able to live with it?KylarCallie is young and beautiful and I should walk away from her.She doesn't deserve this but to save the rest of my darkenedsoul I have to have her and her innocence.I have what she and the BlackPath MC need for their vengeance.Will she pay the Devil his price and give me what I need?MasonCallie needs me but I am stuck here in this God forsaken desert.I'll fight my way back to her if it is the last thing I do. Hang on babe...I'm on my way.
author: Vera Quinn
